English:

Title: Tron Legacy 
Country: USA 
USA release: 17/12/2010 
Released in Spain: 17/12/2010 
Released on DVD (rental): 20/04/2011 
Studio: Walt Disney Pictures 
Director: Joseph Kosinski 
Screenplay: Steven Lisberger, Richard Jeffries, Brian Klugman, Lee Sternthal, Eddy Kitsis, Adam Horowitz, Bill Wheeler 
Cast: Jeff Bridges, Garrett Hedlund, Olivia Wilde, Bruce Boxleitner James Frain, Beau Garrett, Michael Sheen 
Rating: Suitable for all audiences 


Synopsis: 
Sam Flynn (Garrett Hedlund), a tech-savvy 27 year old is obsessed with the mysterious disappearance of his father Kevin Flynn (Jeff Bridges), a man once known as the best game developer in the world. When Sam investigates a strange signal from the former games room of his father (Flynn's Arcade) that could only come from him, he finds himself in the same digital world where his father has been trapped the last 20 years. Together with the intrepid warrior Quorra (Olivia Wilde), father and son embark on an adventure of life and death through a cyber universe created by Kevin that has become much more advanced vehicles never before imagined, weapons, landscapes and a ruthless villain who will stop at nothing to prevent his escape. 

Production notes: 
- Sequel to 'Tron' science fiction film produced by Walt Disney Studios in 1982, whose protagonists were Jeff Bridges, Bruce Boxleitner and Cindy Morgan. This is a 3-D adventure in high technology in a digital world has never before captured on screen. 
- Award winner for Best Banda Sonora DAFT PUNK in the sixth edition of the Copa de Cine 'The Seventh Art "(2010).
